fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) of the deal reference bank.
The Record ID (RID) of the deal.

"The Record ID (RID) of the customer chosen as the ,'deal reference bank,'.  Must have a lender profile but need not be a lender in the deal, in order to be assigned one or more bank roles in the deal."""
"Indicates whether or not this lender can act as a ""Reference Bank"" in the deal."
"Indicates whether or not this lender can act as a ""Competitive Bid Bank"" in the deal."
"Indicates whether or not this lender can act as a ""Swingline Bank"" in the deal."
"Indicates whether or not this lender can act as a ""BA Issuing Bank"" in the deal."
"Indicates whether or not this lender can act as a ""BA Reference Bank"" in the deal."
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
The Record ID (RID) of the servicing group selected for the deal reference bank.
"Indicates whether or not this lender can act as an ""SBLC Issuing Bank"" in the deal."
"Indicates whether or not this lender can act as a ""RAC Bank"" in the deal."
Indicates the percent of every swingline loan (or BA Issuance) that will be assigned to this particular swingline lender (or BA Issuing Bank).
The expense code that will be used to create the host bank portfolio loan shares for the deal reference bank.
The portfolio code that will be used to create the host bank portfolio loan shares for the deal reference bank.

"The branch that will be used to create the host bank portfolio loan shares for the deal reference bank.  A ""deal reference bank"" is a lender assigned one or more bank roles in the deal and portfolio information is required if that lender is a host"
Indicates whether or not this lender can act as a "BA Owner Bank" in the deal.
